body.p:
To the Honlb Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned your petitioners would respectfully state at the special term of the Carroll Circuit Court, Robert McCann was fined fifty dollars for selling Liquor to a Minor -- Your petitioners further state that said McCann is a good law abiding citizen that he was ignorant of the law against selling to minors -- That he is a cripple and ill able to pay the fine. He therefore request your excellency to remit said fine

Decer 6th 1860
Robert McCann
W. M. Fisher
W. S. Brown
G. P. Gallion jr
H. J. Whitehead
D, P, Craig
M. W. Browinski
P, U, Major
Com'ths Atty
H Cox Judge County ct
R. W. Martinson " atto

Carroll Cir. Ct
Respite 12 mos
B. M
$50 } Selling liquor to a minor
Robt McCann
Iss' Dec 10. 1860
